title: League Merchandise
body:
G'day I was just wondering will the out of stock items such as the Gnar, Firecracker Jinx, the urf figures and the Championship Thresh Figures ever gonna be avalible again only because iv been collecting these figures and these are some of the last figures i need to complete my collection but everytime i look at the store they are never avalible i just wanna know if they are ever coming back because its starting to frustrate me that its not updating or something lol 

Thanks
LordCreep

replies.body:
Firecracker Jinx, Championship Thresh and URF figures were all limited edition only. They will not be returning to the store ever (as far as we know). So that kinda sucks :(

Gnar figure should be back in stock soon though. If you want to know for sure, I'd advise you to send in a [ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and ask.

> [{quoted}](name=Telecasterdude,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=r7HWVezp,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-06-21T05:03:18.515+0000)
>
> Firecracker Jinx, Championship Thresh and URF figures were all limited edition only. They will not be returning to the store ever (as far as we know). So that kinda sucks :(
> 
> Gnar figure should be back in stock soon though. If you want to know for sure, I'd advise you to send in a [ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and ask.

I have it just annoys me if they are not coming back they shouldn't be in the store lol it taunts me but thanks breh
